quote.text: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts
quote.author: Marcus Aurelius

scripture.text: Let all that you do be done in love.

message:
Ms Sunshine ☀️

Hey There Ms sunshine the day’s closing, and I hope you’re letting go of the weight you were never meant to hold.I dont know if your day made you happy i dont know Whether today made sense or left you with questions, I want you to know this You were held. The whole time. By the same God who sees what’s ahead and still walks gently beside you. You don’t always need clarity to be faithful. Some days, it’s enough that you showed up... with intention, with care. That’s what makes you beautiful beyond words. Not just what you do, but how you do it. With meaning. With heart. As the world slows down, I pray peace wraps itself around you like a promise. I pray your dreams remind you of what’s possible. I’m proud of you ...not because you’re perfect, but because you’re growing in the direction God planted you.The lord sees you. And I do too. 💙
